colors.name: Gamboge
colors.description: A deep golden yellow with warm undertones, traditionally made from tree resin

colors.name: Buttercup
colors.description: A bright, vivid yellow resembling a buttercup flower

colors.name: Goldenrod
colors.description: A deeper, more muted yellow with golden undertones

colors.name: Daffodil
colors.description: A bright yellow with a hint of orange, like daffodil petals

colors.name: Banana
colors.description: A creamy yellow reminiscent of ripe bananas

colors.name: Flaxen
colors.description: A muted yellow with brown undertones, like the color of flax

colors.name: Indian Yellow
colors.description: A rich, warm yellow with slightly more orange undertones than Gamboge

colors.name: Cadmium Yellow
colors.description: A pure, bright yellow with no warm or cool undertones

colors.name: Lemon Yellow
colors.description: A pale, cool yellow with green undertones

colors.name: Naples Yellow
colors.description: A muted yellow with subtle orange and beige undertones

colors.name: Prussian Blue
colors.description: A very dark blue with slight green undertones, historically important pigment

colors.name: Navy Blue
colors.description: A dark blue with purple undertones, named after naval uniforms

colors.name: Cerulean Blue
colors.description: A pure, medium blue reminiscent of clear skies

colors.name: Azure
colors.description: A bright blue with slight purple undertones, lighter than Cerulean

colors.name: Muted Glaucous
colors.description: A grayish-blue with muted, dusty appearance

colors.name: Winter Glaucous
colors.description: A clearer, more vibrant blue-gray with cooler undertones

colors.name: Vermillion
colors.description: A bright red-orange, traditionally made from cinnabar mineral

colors.name: Cinnabar
colors.description: A deep red with orange undertones, the mineral form of mercury sulfide

colors.name: Cadmium Red
colors.description: A pure, intense red with no blue or yellow undertones

colors.name: Alizarin Crimson
colors.description: A deep red with purple undertones, historically made from madder root

colors.name: Viridian
colors.description: A blue-green with cool, transparent qualities

colors.name: Malachite
colors.description: A bright green with blue undertones, named after the mineral

colors.name: Forest Green
colors.description: A dark green reminiscent of deep forest canopies

colors.name: Sage Green
colors.description: A muted green with gray undertones, like the herb

colors.name: Tyrian Purple
colors.description: A deep purple-red, historically made from murex shells

colors.name: Royal Purple
colors.description: A rich purple with blue undertones, associated with royalty

colors.name: Burnt Orange
colors.description: A dark orange with brown undertones

colors.name: Tangerine
colors.description: A bright orange like the citrus fruit
